values: A torch is a stick with one end on fire that can be carried in order to give light.
He grabbed a piece of wood and stuck it in the fire in order to make a torch.
火炬
手电筒
n. 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物

- n. 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物
- vi. 像火炬一样燃烧
- vt. 用火炬点燃


时 态:  
torched, torching, torches
